item.description:
NOTICE: Don't forget to check for last minute cancellations before leaving to attend any Meetup, especially during the winter months when storms are likely.

We will be viewing a portion of a DVD presentation describing EXACTLY what energetic changes will occur in 2012. 

In preparation, please first view the technical diagrams and take notes while viewing all 3 parts of the free video presentation on

http://www.krystalspi...

Each video takes about 2 hours to view, so allow sufficient time and take notes.  Bring your questions to the Meetup.  A discussion period follows the DVD. 

 

DIRECTIONS: Get on I-93 from wherever you are. We are approx. half an hour north of Concord, NH.

Get off on exit 22. At the end of the ramp go North on Rt. 127 (toward Gaza). In approx. 1.5 miles you will come to a stop sign.

Turn left, going North on Rt 132. Watch for mailbox number 298 on the right side of the road, approx. 1.5 mi. up. A tan building with semi-circular window is across the street, on the left side.

Go up the first driveway into the property, which has a Meetup sign at the end. Do NOT go up the second driveway which has a sign "ULCS Clinic". No parking is allowed there, so if you get that far, turn around in that driveway and go back and up the first driveway.

Enter through the front door, where you will see another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just go on in and down the stairs and have a seat in the classroom. If you are arriving early for a private appointment, have a seat in the waiting room instead.

..

..
item.why: All life forms on planet will be affected by unavoidable cosmic energetic changes coming our way. We must understand these details so that we can start preparing NOW.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: 2012 Details Part 1 - Personal Energy Healing Choices & Consequences
